features.name: Real-Time Voice & Chat Interface
features.description: Donna's AWS-powered voice layer handles 4,000+ concurrent users with adaptive streaming, smart call routing, and real-time transcription. WebSocket and phone integrations enable instant responses across any device. Integrated with Verizon for BYOC (Bring Your Own Carrier) telephony and ElevenLabs for realistic voice synthesis.

features.name: Intelligent Knowledge Base
features.description: Four vertical-specific knowledge bases—Real Estate, Hospitality, Professional Services, and Health & Beauty—each with 200+ curated questions and semantic understanding. Powered by AWS Bedrock + Amazon Q, with automatic data ingestion from 600+ sources.
benefits: Local knowledge base training per client

features.name: Multi-Tenant Architecture
features.description: Each client runs in its own secure environment with isolated data and compute resources. Scalable containers on AWS ECS/Fargate, governed by AWS Control Tower, with Aurora RDS for structured data and DynamoDB for real-time session state.

features.name: AI + Human Collaboration
features.description: Donna routes conversations intelligently across industries. AI manages everyday interactions, while human operators can review, approve, or step in with one click. Choose full automation or hybrid mode with live human support for complex inquiries and high-value interactions.

features.name: Automation & Integrations
features.description: Instant integration with 600+ platforms—Google Workspace, QuickBooks ('Donna Books'), Slack, Zendesk, CRMs, and document systems. Choose real-time or scheduled data refresh to keep Donna's knowledge base always current. Integrates with systems like QuickBooks, Google Workspace, Twilio, and custom CRMs through API connections.

features.name: Monitoring, Security & Compliance
features.description: Continuous monitoring with CloudWatch, X-Ray, and CloudTrail. GuardDuty and Security Hub detect threats automatically. SSL via Certificate Manager, DNS via Route 53, and IAM least-privilege access ensure data stays secure and compliant.

features.name: Performance & Scalability
features.description: Auto-scaling to 5,000+ active sessions, backed by optimized WebSocket and API layers. CI/CD with GitHub + CodePipeline delivers instant updates, while cost optimization keeps operations efficient.

features.name: Client Onboarding & Management
features.description: Persona-based onboarding across 12 user profiles. Guided setup for Quick Suite, connectors, and workflows. Includes monitoring dashboards, admin guides, and runbooks for self-service management.

use_cases: Automating customer responses and appointment booking

useCases.description: Transform your real estate operations with AI that handles property inquiries, schedules showings, qualifies leads, and follows up automatically. DONNA answers questions about listings, neighborhood details, pricing, and availability while seamlessly syncing with your CRM.

Elevate guest experiences with 24/7 reservation management, instant answers to common questions, room service coordination, and concierge-level support. DONNA handles booking modifications, special requests, and local recommendations while maintaining your brand's voice.

Streamline client intake and appointment management for law firms, consulting agencies, and professional practices. DONNA collects intake forms, schedules consultations, sends reminders, and manages follow-ups so your team can focus on billable work.

Manage your salon, spa, or wellness center with automated appointment booking, service inquiries, and client communication. DONNA handles scheduling, cancellations, rescheduling, package information, and sends appointment reminders to reduce no-shows.
Automate project inquiries, permit tracking, and client communication for construction companies and ADU builders.
Support community organizations with event management, member communication, and volunteer coordination.

faq.question: What makes Donna different from ChatGPT or Alexa?
faq.answer: Donna is built specifically for business operations — she integrates directly with your workflows, handles real phone calls, manages your inbox, and automates follow-ups, unlike general-purpose AI assistants.

faq.question: How long does setup take?
faq.answer: Setup typically takes 15-30 minutes. We guide you through connecting your phone, email, calendar, and CRM. Most customers are live within an hour.

faq.question: Can DONNA handle multiple languages?
faq.answer: Yes! DONNA supports 25+ languages including English, Spanish, and Mandarin, and can seamlessly switch between them during conversations. Perfect for diverse customer bases.

faq.question: What happens to my data?
faq.answer: Your data is encrypted and stored securely. All customer data is encrypted and processed within secure AWS environments compliant with privacy standards. We never train our models on customer data. You maintain complete ownership and control.

faq.question: Can I customize DONNA for my business?
faq.answer: Absolutely. You can train DONNA on your business documents, pricing, policies, and procedures. It learns your business context with local knowledge base training per client.

faq.question: Can Donna integrate with my existing tools?
faq.answer: Yes. Donna integrates with 600+ platforms including Salesforce, HubSpot, Google Workspace, Microsoft 365, Zapier, QuickBooks, Twilio, and custom CRMs through API connections. Custom integrations available too.

faq.question: Do you offer customer support?
faq.answer: Yes, all customers get email support. You can reach the Bird's Eye support team at derek@bem.studio or use the chatbot's contact form. Pro and Enterprise plans include phone and video support with dedicated success managers.

faq.question: What is the difference between the pricing tiers?
faq.answer: We're currently in an active invite-only beta program. Free tier gets you on the waitlist for early access. The $5,000 Pilot program provides immediate access with full features and priority support. Custom tier is for enterprise needs, partnerships, and custom builds. Final pricing tiers will be announced post-beta, and current beta users have custom agreements based on usage and features.

faq.question: How does the AI + Human collaboration work?
faq.answer: You can choose full automation or hybrid mode. In hybrid mode, AI handles routine interactions while human operators can review, approve, or step in for complex inquiries with one click through a unified dashboard. This hybrid model ensures high-quality lead conversion.

faq.question: What industries does DONNA support?
faq.answer: DONNA has specialized knowledge bases for Real Estate, Hospitality, Professional Services, Health & Beauty, Construction/ADU builders, and Nonprofits/Chambers of Commerce. Each vertical includes 200+ curated questions and industry-specific workflows.

faq.question: Is Donna secure?
faq.answer: Absolutely. DONNA is built on AWS enterprise infrastructure with SOC 2 Type II certification, GDPR compliance, bank-level encryption, IAM-based access, data isolation for each client tenant, and continuous monitoring. We partner with Verizon for superior network reliability.

faq.question: Can DONNA scale with my business?
faq.answer: Yes! DONNA auto-scales to handle 5,000+ active sessions with 99.9% uptime guarantee. Built on AWS ECS/Fargate with multi-tenant architecture for enterprise-grade scalability.

faq.question: Can I white-label Donna for my business?
faq.answer: Yes. Donna can be rebranded and customized for agencies, chambers, or enterprises that want a branded AI solution. Fully customizable for agencies, enterprises, or civic organizations.

faq.question: How do I get started?
faq.answer: You can join the free waitlist, apply for the $5,000 Pilot program, or contact us for custom enterprise solutions. Sign up on the landing page with your business email or request a demo through the contact form. Setup takes 15-30 minutes once you're onboarded.

faq.question: How do I contact support?
faq.answer: You can reach the Bird's Eye support team at derek@bem.studio, use the chatbot's contact form, or email derek@bem.studio.

faq.question: Can DONNA join my meetings?
faq.answer: Yes! This is one of DONNA's most unique features. DONNA can seamlessly join your video meetings (Zoom, Teams, Google Meet, etc.) and sit quietly in the background. Simply say 'Hey Donna' to activate her, and she can instantly answer questions from meeting participants, pull up information from your knowledge base, provide pricing details, explain features, or clarify any aspect of your business—all in real-time. This allows you to answer client questions during presentations without leaving the meeting. No other AI assistant offers this real-time meeting interaction capability.

faq.question: How does the 'Hey Donna' feature work?
faq.answer: The 'Hey Donna' activation feature allows DONNA to join your video meetings and interact in real-time. DONNA joins the meeting and waits quietly in the background. When you or any participant says 'Hey Donna', she instantly activates and can answer questions, provide information, explain features, or access data from your knowledge base—all live during the meeting. This is perfect for sales calls, client presentations, or team meetings where you need instant access to information without interrupting the flow of conversation.
